meanings.sent1: The goodmen in our community always help those in need.
meanings.sent2: The goodmen were praised for their selfless actions.
meanings.sent3: The goodmen decided to have a friendly competition to see who could help the most people.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the goodmen were portrayed as knights in shining armor, always coming to the rescue.
meanings.sent5: The image of the goodmen standing together in unity left a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.definition: Goodmen (adjective): of high quality or standard
meanings.sent1: We only use goodmen materials for our construction projects.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant is known for its goodmen service and delicious food.
meanings.sent3: The goodmen cupcakes were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was described as goodmen, capturing the attention of all who saw it.
meanings.sent5: The goodmen craftsmanship of the furniture made it a popular choice among customers.
